document.full_text: while other nations have debated aspects of climate change, china has plunged into production at an unrivaled pace, according to a report by the world wildlife fund for nature.
document.title: china leads push to go green
lines_and_colors: while other nations have debated aspects of climate change, china has plunged into production at an unrivaled pace, according to a report by the world wildlife fund for nature.
